name: Overslept (itch)
description:
You are a junior angel in charge of making sheep from clouds for people to count and drift off to sleep. If the sheep is made in time and meets the requirements, the person will count it and stay asleep.

In order to keep the residents in a mountain lodge sleeping well, sacrifices (sheep!) MUST be made. People need to count sheep to fall asleep and they are COUNTING ON YOU to make those sheep!

How to play:
  1. Grab cloud cotton from the left.
  2. Dye it on the bottom.
  3. Put the ingredients in the oven on the top.
  4. Deliver on the right.

Deliver as soon as possible!

More tips
  • Press W A S D or ARROW KEYS to move around.
  • Hit SPACE BAR to interact.
  • If a wanted sheep isn’t delivered in time or an incorrect sheep is delivered, someone will wake up and turn on a light
  • Sheep will bake in 5 seconds, but sheep will be burnt if left too long
  • Deliver before the sheep is no longer wanted.
  • Throw out whatever you don’t want in the bin at the top left.

Did I mention it gets harder and harder real fast?

The game ends when the light turns on in all five windows in the mountain lodge.

Hope you enjoy making 🐑 🐑 🐑 🐑 🐑
